DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether patient undergone exstrophy closure may risk long-term orthopedic issue manifest gait abnormality . This study descriptive analysis study cohort 's gait pattern pelvic structure . Specific Aim 1 : determine whether patient classic bladder exstrophy underwent closure demonstrate gait abnormality . Hypothesis 1 : Patients undergoing closure bladder exstrophy ( without pelvic osteotomy ) demonstrate gait abnormality compare reference population . Hypothesis 2 : Patients undergoing closure bladder exstrophy ( without pelvic osteotomy ) normal functional survey score .
DOC.brief_title: Biomechanical Assessment Level Gait Patient 's Status Post Bladder Exstrophy
